column1: The information requested below relates to non-consolidated performance related payments (NCPRP) for the performance year 2016-17 only. Do not include any payments that relate to performance for year 2017-18.Please ensure you have read the accompanying guidance notes before attempting to complete this template.
column6: NB: Main departments should co-ordinate returns for all their relevant agencies in scope for this exercise and send to Cabinet Office one return that contains a line of information for each organisation.

column34: Delegated grades: At 31st March 2017 the CPS had 54 employees in the delegated grades cadre whose roles were equivalent in seniority to the SCS. These staff are Senior Legal Managers (SLM) and comprise of Chief Crown Prosecutors & Deputy Chief Crown Prosecutors. They are the most senior legal grades in the CPS and are the only CPS delegated grades with a PRP scheme.  Of these 54 employees 9 received a PRP payment.
